derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  bierce, birce, of Germanic origin; related to German Birke

entry.def: A birch is a type of tall tree with thin branches.
The birch is a punishment in which someone is hit with a wooden stick.

means.word_mean: 1. hard close-grained wood of any of various birch trees; used especially in furniture and interior finishes and plywood
2. any betulaceous tree or shrub of the genus Betula having a thin peeling bark
3. bundle of birch twigs used to hit people as punishment
1. consisting of or made of wood of the birch tree
